version.title: Version
version.description: The Schema version. Must be prefixed with "vulnlog/v" and followed by a semantic version number. Example: "vulnlog/v1.0.0".

metadata.title: Additional Information
metadata.description: Context information around this Vulnlog file. These information help to provide more context in Vulnlog generated artifacts.

include.title: Include Vulnlog Files
include.description: Specify which other Vulnlog files to include in this Vulnlog file. This keeps the main file smaller and cleaner.

releases.title: Releases
releases.description: Defines the releases of the product.

reporters.title: Reporters
reporters.description: Defines the reporters of vulnerabilities on the product.

vulnerabilities.title: Vulnerabilities
vulnerabilities.description: Defines the vulnerabilities of the product.
